law.catch_line: Organizational structure of Office of Career and Technical Education -- Ombudsman.
law.text:
The Office of Career and Technical Education shall have the following organizational structure:
The commissioner of education shall appoint an assistant pursuant to KRS 12.050 and 156.010 and assign duties as appropriate;
The appointing authority shall appoint an ombudsman pursuant to KRS 12.050 and specify his or her functions and duties; and
The Kentucky Technical Education Personnel Board, pursuant to KRS 156.840, shall be attached to the Department of Education for administrative purposes.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 6, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 15, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 23, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 8, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 45, effective May 30, 1997. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 469, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 470, sec. 3, effective July 1, 1990.
